function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Ineffectiveness of UVGI in inactivating more-resistant bacteria and fungal spores","Impact":"Higher risk of bacterial and fungal contamination in the built environment","Mitigation":"Regular monitoring and maintenance of UV light bulbs and lamps to ensure sufficient UV light intensity","Technologies":"UV light intensity monitoring tools","People":"Building occupants, especially those with compromised immune systems","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Inadequate mixing of room air for UVGI to effectively inactivate microorganisms","Impact":"Reduced efficacy of UVGI system in inactivating airborne bacteria and fungal spores","Mitigation":"Installation of mixing fans or ensuring moderate ventilation and air mixing in the room","Technologies":"Mixing fans, ventilation system controls","People":"Building occupants, especially those with compromised immune systems","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Incorrect implementation of combination of general ventilation system and UV lamps","Impact":"Improper exposure of airborne particles to UV-C irradiation, leading to incomplete inactivation of microbes","Mitigation":"Proper calibration of ventilation rate and ventilation system to ensure adequate exposure to UV-C irradiation","Technologies":"Ventilation rate control systems, UV intensity sensors","People":"Building occupants, especially those with compromised immune systems","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"}]}
